properties.name: merchantId
properties.description: The processor should supply the API merchant id.

properties.name: token
properties.description: The processor should supply the API token.

properties.name: callbackUrl
properties.description: This is the url that should be called from the processor side. The hash is the processor service name sha1.

properties.name: websiteCallbackRedirect
properties.description: This is the url that should be redirected to from the lithium server when a callback is received from netaxept.
